storyInfo: The female researcher reveals the village’s past while the enraged Rathalos rushes out of the mine, igniting all the nearby Originium and hastening a Catastrophe. The beasts go on a rampage, pulling Yato and the old hunter into a crisis.

attributes.content: I never thought the cave would be so close to a volcano.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: My tail is feeling so warm—

attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: Meowch! It's hot!
It's on fire!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Now I get why you want to close the mine. We'd have done the same, in your shoes.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This place has definitely been overmined. It even has an Originium processing plant, but none of the specialized equipment you'd usually see...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This has gone way further than a tiny village can handle.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mining so carelessly without strict safeguards in place will only result in the leakage of active Originium particles, and inevitably cause Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: But what I don't get is...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Based on what you said, they started mining seven years ago, and the person who lead the project was your uncle, the current village headman.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: So... why do the tunnels stretch so deep after just seven years? They can't possibly have dug all this themselves.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You're half-correct.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The mining tunnels weren't dug by the villagers, they were already here before.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Remember what I said earlier, about the beast outbreak seven years ago?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Yeah, you said it was a real serious one, and that old Kashiwau's son, Akira, was also a hunter... and lost his life in it.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That was a direct consequence of the mining.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: You good, Scholar?
attributes.name: Noir Corne
Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: I'm purrfectly fine, what exactly did I trip on?

attributes.name: Felyne Scholar
attributes.content: Meow!
Bones?!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Yeah, that's a whole lotta bones, plus teeth, and... claws?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: They have been dead fur a long time...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Wait, this form... It must have been a large carnivorous creature! This is my furst time seeing one here!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Judging from its remains, it would have been covered in scales and have well-developed forelimbs with long and sharp claws. So it most pawbably was good at digging holes!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: An arma-clawbeast.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: That's their name. A type of predator that once inhabited this region. They were social creatures that would dig their nests in the mountains.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: This mine was actually one of their nests, and they built majestic palaces over the years while tunneling through the surrounding Originium veins.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But we haven't seen a single one down here, or in the forest.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That's because... they disappeared seven years ago.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Disappeared?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Disappeared? Fur real?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The very last trace of their species in this area is the pile of skeletons before you.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: How... How exactly did something like that happen?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Back when this Originium mine was newly discovered, Akira Kashiwau was firmly against the project.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: He reckoned destroying the arma-clawbeasts' nests would net unpredictable consequences, and that Originium mining itself wasn't exactly safe either.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: On the other hand, my uncle and the other villagers believed that they desperately needed the potential profits to change their grueling way of life.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: So concealing it from Akira, they and the other hunters banded together to exterminate all the arma-clawbeasts in the region. In order to freely mine the Originium.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But the slaughter resulted in the surviving arma-clawbeasts rampaging through the forest, leading to the beast outbreak that year.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: So many innocent lives were lost... just for the sake of opening a mine.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You must have seen my uncle's attitude, yes?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: To him, the Rathalos is simply the manifestation of vengeance from all the beasts he's slaughtered. He definitely has dreams about Akira's death on the regular too.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: His closest friend, his apprentice, carried out the will of a hunter to the very end... and died for his sake.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: And now that Akira's predictions have come true... naturally he's terrified.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Akira died for the headman's sake? I thought he lost his life protecting the village...?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The outbreak wasn't threatening the village, but was closer to the mine.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: He was beset by frenzied beasts whose numbers far surpassed any regular outbreak we'd seen.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Oh, we're here.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Originium rocks were clustering around the lava bubbling in the cave.
The King of the Skies lifted its head.
The insignificant Oni looked down.
Their eyes each reflected the other's gaze.
Chikushou-me.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's surrounded by a bunch of Originium rocks.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Since you didn't want to deal with it right now, take care not to get too close.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: If we accidentally anger it, we'll be in deep trouble.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Got it. Scholar... where you at?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The Rathalos... seems to be using the Originium fur its lair.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: This is impawssible to comprehend...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: It looks like... it's in a lot of pain. Is it because of the Originium on it?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Most pawbably, and there seems to be substantially more particles compurred to our previous encounter.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Right now it's more or less an oversized source of pollution spreading Originium dust wherever it goes.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: My hypawthesis is that... the Rathalos most pawbably was just trying to survive, and ended up nesting here.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But being deep in the mines, it's constantly exposed to Originium.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: When it returns to the forest to feed, the flames it spews while hunting will in turn trigger the clusters on its body, dispersing purrticles everywhere.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: So it's a victim of Originium too.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Must you hunt it, Noir Corne?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The Originium is too much of a danger to leave alone, and considering the safety of both the village and ourselves, hunting it is the best way of handling the situation.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: But if we can deal with just the clusters... I just need a little more time! I'll bring out my binoculars...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: What else could there be...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow? Those tracks are...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Scholar, come quick! You're too far out, the ground's too unstable over there!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrow?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Haha... caught ya.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mrow.. I was so afuraid!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Noir Corne! Why didn't mew warn me earlier?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Did mew see that?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The bignawculars just bounced off the Rathalos's head.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Sparks are coming out of its jaws.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Just run already! The mine is gonna be destroyed!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Run fur it!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: I'm running!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: If it triggers all the Originium here, the anomalies are definitely going to spike, and then...
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: It'll be a Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.text: A black mist shrouds the sky, and the mountains and rivers burst.
Wind scales the peaks, and flames rise like a crimson tide.
Vegetation burns to ashes, and life into coal.
The village gates swing open, and the houses collapse.
All life cowers, and the heavens fall.

attributes.content: Nghh... hah... hah...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: They're dodging my slashes so easily.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: How foolish. You clearly lack a hunter's intuition. Their weak point is the soft patch of skin in their jaws.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Stab straight in, so you can slit the throat.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: ...Got it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Sixfold Slash!)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: A hit! Ah...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Have a taste of this, kono yarou!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Aghh—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We did it!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Be careful of the rear, mew two!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Nanja korya?!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: (Twofold Slash!)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Are my hands... losing their strength?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: On my way to a certain village, I heard tales of an endless stream of dragons, but to... purrsonally witness a similar event.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The beast outbreak is showing no signs of abating. If we remain trapped here, we'll eventually collapse from exhaustion. We have to find a way out.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If we can make our way to those tall trees over there, we can make use of the canopy's height to avoid the rampage.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I have an idea.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What's this?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This is the powder I used to trigger the hornbeasts earlier, in hopes of luring out the Rathalos. But I used too much and lost control of the herd.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Using it on people is unheard of, and probably suicidal. But right now.... this might be our only method of drawing them away.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: But that means...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes, whoever is affected by it will be beset by the entire horde... But as long as we can make our way through, it will be worth it... Probably...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No... Artisan, do you still have that rope from earlier?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes! I made so meowch of it!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Good... it's long and tough enough to support the weight of multiple people. If we tie it to the tree, we can use it as a makeshift grappling hook to retrieve whoever's acting as bait.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Which will be me, so if you would...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No, I must be the bait.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I won't allow it. It's too dangerous to let you get surrounded by the horde again. If you sacrifice yourself here, wouldn't that make my efforts to save you meaningless?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't know if I'd be able to rescue you with these old hands of mine, but I can at least make sure not to croak before you rescue me.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I have faith in you, girl.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: ...Fine, let's do this.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Come, you dastards! Over here!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes, just like that! Chase me like the lunatics you are!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Now's my chance!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Flurry Rush!)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hrrh—haah!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It worked... purrfectly!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Deploy the grappling hook immediately, I'll go retrieve Kashiwau!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: These beasts just charge straight at me with wild abandon.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: We really lured them away...I can't believe it.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: There's simply so many of them...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: That day... that day seven years ago, was also like this...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Brat... Is this how you felt, that night? Did you... die to something like this?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Was this... what you saw in your final moments?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Surrounded by these beasts, encircled by their jaws, drowning in their saliva.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You must have been slaying them one after another with this spear, just like this.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: But no matter how many you killed, there were always more of these damnable beasts, wave after relentless wave.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Ngh—Agh! Begone!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kuso! They saw you as a mere slab of meat to be divided between themselves, no longer among the living.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: And knowing you, brat, you probably just kept your mouth shut, rather than calling for help.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Simply brandishing this lance till your strength failed you, till you could wield it no longer.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Collapsing on some rocks, slowly falling to your knees... Yet the beasts never ceased their advance!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Ah... so that's how it was.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Kashiwau, grab my hand!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What are you blanking out for?! Quickly!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Got you!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Palico, pull the rope!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Finally...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Not yet, your meowjesty... The branches over there have broken...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Meowny more beasts rush over as we speak!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Chikushou, is there anything else we can do?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Your meowjesty, look! The beasts are scattering all of a sudden!
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Mrow... A noise from the sky.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The Rathalos soars through the sky! And that's...
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: Nantekotta...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: A Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The gale carelessly bound both land and sky together with flame, like an ignorant life devouring everything in its path.
Trees were but weeds within the tornado of fire, and mountains crumbled to rubble.
The most fearless of warriors were powerless to stand against it, and the most devout prayers echoed to no avail.
It had arrived, the land's retribution.
Jump down! Brace for impact!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Is everyone alright?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm... purrfectly fine as well.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: The sky is alight... Pillars of crimson flame... Kuso, what a truly terrifying sight.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: ...I've read about a similar case on the landship before.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: A hurricane unleashed by a Catastrophe encircled a mountain on fire, becoming a ferocious firestorm.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: As it moves, the vortex pulls from its surroundings. And with everything combustible in this forest... I can't imagine the consequences.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Why...  Why did the Catastrophe strike so soon?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The center of the firestorm... it's near the mine.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The mine?!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Taste my blade!
Hey! So this is where you guys were. See, Scholar? Just like I said...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That's enough yapping, Noir Corne. I expect a full report soon.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Aight.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Old Kashiwau? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I could ask you the same thing, Mirai.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You can hardly call this fortunate, but at least we managed to escape the horde thanks to the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't know what the situation in the village is right now, but the core of the Catastrophe is still quite a ways away and moving fairly slowly. However, that's not the case with the beast outbreak.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Any ideas on how to return to the village as soon as possible?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, if that's still nearby... Maybe we can use it to descend the mountain quickly!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: It has not been used for a long time. I can't be sure if it still works.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So, uh, planning on letting the rest of us in on this?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's a railcar. We used it a lot when the mines were just opening, and it made things real convenient, but after the cave was repaired we more or less abandoned it.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Don't worry, it should still work fine. It was the very first thing I designed, after all.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Weren't you an ecologist? I'm not sure I should trust your skills as a railcar engineer...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Kashiwau, our next battle won't be any easier, so I hope you're prepared.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't suppose you'd let this old man loaf about for once?
attributes.name: Takii Kashiwau

attributes.content: Please, by all means. I fully intend to respect your opinion.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm aware that I tend to ignore the ideas of those around me and insist on doing things my way. And that this is a behavior I should correct.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The mistakes I've made were precisely because of that, and I should also apologize for what I said earlier.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm sorry for my unproductive words, without knowing anything about your background. I did not intend to hurt you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So will you accept my apology?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Fine... if it pleases you.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Good, then that's settled.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Girl...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Earlier you said you understood me... what did you mean by that?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Ah, that... It's a bit of a long story.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If it's a bother, just pretend I didn't ask.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No, I don't mind. You see, before joining Rhodes Island, I was an assassin.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Nani?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: A literal killer, acting on orders to take the lives of my people, day and night.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Until one day, I looked at my bloodstained hands and felt nothing but fear in my heart. The next day, I was tasked to dispose of a mother and daughter, but chose to protect them instead.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Because I didn't want to be a killer anymore. That was also the day I met Noir Corne, who listened to my story and chose the same path.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But I'd made a mistake. It wasn't just a matter of refusing to kill.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The pair I saved were so frightened of me that I could only leave them in a safe place. And while in the moment I felt only the weightless relief of not taking a life, I had forgotten something important...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That the only end awaiting them was to be killed by someone else.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Do you... regret it?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes. For a long time after that, I... often dreamt of them. They would ask me why I had left them to die.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I didn't want to hurt innocents anymore, but I still ended up indirectly cutting their lives short.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...I used to wonder if I was even capable of protecting anyone at all.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Luckily, I had help... Thanks to him, I made my decision.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You mean the boy over there?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: He scolded me—a rare occurrence—and said...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: 'The past is the past... All your remorse, all the sins you carry, make up for them with your future.'
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I took him for just an oddball, but I suppose he's got a proper head on after all.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What he said seemed right to me, and since then I haven't given it much thought.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We decided to make it our mission to protect others, and he dragged me along to join Rhodes Island. And because of our similar objectives, we're still working together even now.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This must be some company, to hiring on people like you.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So protecting others is your way of atoning for your past?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You might say it started like that, but I've had a few additional insights along the way.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I've seen too much life and death. There are many reasons people might surrender their lives, and some even seek death out of ignorance.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You could say I stubbornly impose my will on others, but only because of my duty to protect your lives.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Life in this land is not meant to end so easily, but to be lived and experience all its possibilities.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So I will continue my efforts.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't want to regret anything, or to see people forced to gaze only at ruins.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So I refuse to leave you alone.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato! Kashiwau! We found the railcar and it's still working!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hey, what're you both looking at me like that for? Is there something on my mask?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It's nothing. We'll be right over.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Anyway, I look forward to cooperating with you in the upcoming battle, Kashiwau.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Holds out hand)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I've told you this so many times already, that's my quarry.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You need only watch from the sidelines and applaud my brilliance.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The path you've chosen is not an easy one.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: All I can do is wish you the best.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Likewise.
attributes.name: Yato
